settings.content: Handsling ships bikes, frames and components throughout the world using professional courier companies. Find shipping, duties and tax details below.

settings.title: UK DPD 24hr
settings.content:
Small item (inc. BB) Shipping - £5.00

Standard Shipping - £15.00

Wheels Shipping - £25.00

Frame Shipping - £40.00

Bike Shipping - £50.00

settings.title: UK
settings.content:
• Shipping is available for all frame, bike, and accessory orders.
  • Shipping costs are calculated at checkout for all items.
  • VAT is included in the product price.
  • We use DPD, DHL, or FedEx for UK deliveries.
  • Tracking information will be provided for all orders once dispatched.

Small item Shipping - €30.00

Standard BB Shipping - €50.00

Medium Item Shipping - €70.00

Frame Shipping - €105.00

Bike Shipping - €135.00

Please note: Our prices in Europe include all tax & duty, no additional charges when the order arrives.

settings.title: EU
settings.content:
• Taxes are included in product price
  • Duties are calculated in checkout
  • Orders are shipped DDP (Delivered Duty Paid)
  • Shipping costs are calculated at checkout.
  • We use DHL, FedEx, or other trusted international couriers.
  • Tracking information will be provided once dispatched.

All bikes and frame prices include shipping, as well as tax & duty. There are no additional charges.

Smaller items have shipping cost calculated at checkout.

settings.title: USA and Canada
settings.content:
• Orders are shipped DAP (Delivered At Place) — taxes and duties are not included and may be charged upon delivery.
  • Shipping costs are calculated at checkout.
  • We use DHL, FedEx, or other trusted international couriers.
  • Tracking information will be provided once dispatched.

Small item Shipping - €30.00

Standard BB Shipping - €50.00

Medium Item Shipping - €70.00

Frame Shipping - €105.00

Bike Shipping - €135.00

Please note: Our prices in Europe include all tax & duty, no additional charges when the order arrives.

settings.title: Rest of the World
settings.content:
• Orders are shipped DAP (Delivered At Place) — taxes and duties are not included and may be charged upon delivery.
  • Shipping costs are calculated at checkout.
  • We use DHL, FedEx, or other trusted international couriers.
  • Tracking information will be provided once dispatched.

settings.title: Rest of the World
settings.content: All shipping costs are automatically added at checkout.
